title: LF players to join my ranked team. ELO is Silver.
body:
Hi all

Looking to make a ranked team and need some summoners. I want to be apart of a ranked team to one day (hopefully) be semi-pro or at least highly ranked as a team, so I need only serious enquires only. I'm just starting out in terms of ranked teams but I would like to be successful with skilled players who don't flame :D Constructive critisism is welcomed as it helps us all improve.

Looking for: 
- ADC main
- SUP main
- JNG main

Silver players are preferred as we are just starting out.

Facebook: Karl Davis (captain america)
Instagram: karlospicyweiner

Contact me with any serious offers/inquiries please :)

replies.body:
id OoMelodyoO
Silver IV sup main
Also I don't have facebook or instagram...Is skype ok?
Supp main! I main every support in the game (not play, main) in silver 5.
Hey mate I would be interested in being the ADC but i am bronze 1...a few tips on mid game play and picking the best match up would boost me a lot.
